monogr.title: The Christian East – Its Institutions and its Thought: A Critical Reflection. Papers of the International Scholarly Congress for the 75th Anniversary of the Pontifical Oriental Institute, Rome, 30 May – 5 June 1993

body.bibl: Halleux, André de. “Vingt Ans d’étude Critique Des Églises Syriaques.” In The Christian East – Its Institutions and Its Thought: A Critical Reflection. Papers of the International Scholarly Congress for the 75th Anniversary of the Pontifical Oriental Institute, Rome, 30 May – 5 June 1993, edited by Robert F. Taft, 145–79. Orientalia Christiana Analecta 251. Rome: Pontificium Institutum Orientalium Studiorum, 1996.

Papers of the International Scholarly Congress for the 75th Anniversary of the Pontifical Oriental Institute, Rome, 30 May – 5 June 1993, ed. Robert F. Taft, Orientalia Christiana Analecta 251 (Rome: Pontificium Institutum Orientalium Studiorum, 1996), 145–79.
